document.full_text: hundreds of islamist salafists defied security forces and held special prayers friday for al qaeda leader osama bin laden, killed in a u.s. raid in pakistan this week.
document.title: egypt salafists honor bin laden with death prayer
lines_and_colors: hundreds of islamist salafists defied security forces and held special prayers friday for al qaeda leader osama bin laden, killed in a u.s. raid in pakistan this week.
